0.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='senara'>Senara</phoneme> <break time='200ms'/> & <break time='200ms'/> <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='himaja'>Himaya</phoneme>: <break time='200ms'/> We'll <break time='200ms'/> do <break time='200ms'/> it. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

1.text: Aunt Minoli : I'll dice the tomatoes and chop the garlic.
1.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Aunt <break time='200ms'/> <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='minoli'>Minoli</phoneme> <break time='200ms'/> : <break time='200ms'/> I'll <break time='200ms'/> dice <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> tomatoes <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> chop <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> garlic. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

2.text: Lakshitha : Shall I light the fire?
2.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='lakʃit̪a'>Lakshitha</phoneme> <break time='200ms'/> : <break time='200ms'/> Shall <break time='200ms'/> I <break time='200ms'/> light <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> fire? <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

3.text: Aunt Minoli : Alright. Now add the vegetables and pour some water into the pot. Now put the other ingredients and let it boil.
3.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Aunt <break time='200ms'/> <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='minoli'>Minoli</phoneme> <break time='200ms'/> : <break time='200ms'/> Alright. <break time='200ms'/> Now <break time='200ms'/> add <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> vegetables <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> pour <break time='200ms'/> some <break time='200ms'/> water <break time='200ms'/> into <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> pot. <break time='200ms'/> Now <break time='200ms'/> put <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> other <break time='200ms'/> ingredients <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> let <break time='200ms'/> it <break time='200ms'/> boil. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

4.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='senara'>Senara</phoneme> <break time='200ms'/> : <break time='200ms'/> Mmmmm……It <break time='200ms'/> smells <break time='200ms'/> good. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

5.text: Aunt Minoli : Oh! Himaya, add a pinch of salt and pepper and put off the fire, please.
5.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Aunt <break time='200ms'/> <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='minoli'>Minoli</phoneme> <break time='200ms'/> : <break time='200ms'/> Oh! <break time='200ms'/> <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='himaja'>Himaya</phoneme>, <break time='200ms'/> add <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> pinch <break time='200ms'/> of <break time='200ms'/> salt <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> pepper <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> put <break time='200ms'/> off <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> fire, <break time='200ms'/> please. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

6.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='himaja'>Himaya</phoneme> <break time='200ms'/> : <break time='200ms'/> Alright. <break time='200ms'/> I'll <break time='200ms'/> do <break time='200ms'/> it. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

7.text: Aunt Minoli : Let's have dinner. Lakshita, can you please lay the table?
7.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Aunt <break time='200ms'/> <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='minoli'>Minoli</phoneme> <break time='200ms'/> : <break time='200ms'/> Let's <break time='200ms'/> have <break time='200ms'/> dinner. <break time='200ms'/> <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='lakʃit̪a'>Lakshita</phoneme>, <break time='200ms'/> can <break time='200ms'/> you <break time='200ms'/> please <break time='200ms'/> lay <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> table? <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

8.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Read <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> Match <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

10.text: Here are the steps to make a soup. Read and match the pictures.
10.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Here <break time='200ms'/> are <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> steps <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> make <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> soup. <break time='200ms'/> Read <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> match <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> pictures. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

11.text: a. Wash the vegetables. b. Cut the vegetables into small pieces. c. Put them into a pan and add water. d. Add some pepper, salt and then cook. e. Now let's enjoy the soup.
11.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>a. <break time='200ms'/> Wash <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> vegetables. <break time='200ms'/> b. <break time='200ms'/> Cut <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> vegetables <break time='200ms'/> into <break time='200ms'/> small <break time='200ms'/> pieces. <break time='200ms'/> c. <break time='200ms'/> Put <break time='200ms'/> them <break time='200ms'/> into <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> pan <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> add <break time='200ms'/> water. <break time='200ms'/> d. <break time='200ms'/> Add <break time='200ms'/> some <break time='200ms'/> pepper, <break time='200ms'/> salt <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> then <break time='200ms'/> cook. <break time='200ms'/> e. <break time='200ms'/> Now <break time='200ms'/> let's <break time='200ms'/> enjoy <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> soup. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>
